sentences.en: A number of senior people were regarded as likely to occupy the now vacant post.
sentences.cn: 几位资深人士被认为有望填补现在空缺的职位。

sentences.en: Are there any vacant positions in your firm?
sentences.cn: 你们公司有空缺 吗 ?

sentences.en: He stared into space with a vacant expression.

sentences.cn: 他的头脑似乎空空如也.

sentences.en: In every major city there are more vacant buildings than there are homeless people.
sentences.cn: 各大城市里空置的楼房都比无家可归的人多。

sentences.en: Only a few apartments were still vacant.
sentences.cn: 只有几套公寓仍然空着。

sentences.en: Please leave the front row of seats vacant.
sentences.cn: 请把前面一排座位空出来.

sentences.en: She had a kind of vacant look on her face.
sentences.cn: 在她脸上有一种茫然的表情。

sentences.en: The position of chairman has been vacant for some time.
sentences.cn: 主席的职位已经空缺一段时间了。

sentences.en: The seat next to him was vacant.
The vacant house was on the block.
The vacant W.B.C. junior-lightweight title has been called off.
sentences.cn: 空缺的世界拳击理事会次轻量级头衔被取消了。

sentences.en: There are many vacant seats in the carriage.
There was only a vacant lot (= empty unused area of land in a city ) where her house used to be.
sentences.cn: 她以前房子所在的地方只剩下一块空地了。

sentences.en: There were many vacant seats in the theatre.
They may headhunt her for the vacant position of Executive Producer.
sentences.cn: 他们可能会挖她去填补执行制片人这一空缺职位。

sentences.en: Vacant rooms on the campus were being used by holidaying families.
sentences.cn: 校园里的闲置宿舍住着一些度假的家庭。

words.tran_cn: 空虚；空白；思想贫乏；无聊之事

trans.tran_cn: 空着的，未被占用的，空缺的，茫然的，若有所失的
trans.tran_en: a vacant seat, building, room or piece of land is empty and available for someone to use
